item.title: Why Trump Doesn’t Want Judicial Review of His Deportation of Venezuelans
item.description: The president’s legal position that he can proceed with no input from Congress or judicial review is on shaky ground.

item.title: The Visitor Mocks the Illegal-Immigration Craze
item.description: Bruce LaBruce outstrips his contemporary political-film allies.

item.title: Milei Isn’t Out of the Woods Yet
item.description: Milei has not yet been able to rid Argentina of its maze of capital controls, despite his promises to do so.

item.title: History Ended Five Years Ago
item.description: Even as the people who misled us about Covid-19 make embarrassing admissions, so much is unknown — putting a shadow on all history before it.

item.title: The Kansas State Capitol Is No Place for Satanists
item.description: The state has tried to be polite. Now it’s time to be ‘rude.’
